page.title: 03My Home
page.content:
The estate where I live did not exist fifteen years ago, it was all farmland.
When my parents moved in in 1971 there was only a small part of my road built, the rest of the estate was builders and fields. My parents paid less than Â£10,000 for our house, today it is worth more than three times that amount.
My grandparents did not own their own houses, they rented. My mum says that when she was young few of her friends lived in houses their parents owned. Almost all of my friends do.
Our estate has only one shop and a small infants' school, otherwise there is nothing but houses.
